Package org.xjge.graphics

Enum BufferType

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<BufferType>
org.xjge.graphics.BufferType
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<BufferType>, java.lang.constant.Constable
public enum BufferType
extends java.lang.Enum<BufferType>
Represents a GLSL data type that will be used to allocate a data buffer of corresponding size.
Since:
2.0.0
